text:
Hi Brian, what you’re running into is that our default modules were created before true style fields existed. The ones you see in the default modules have not yet been converted to use the new/real style field functionality you’ve come to like. We’re hoping to rectify that, but haven’t implemented yet.

So unfortunately for now you would need to re-create the style fields.
Hi, in HubSpot there are some modules on the left side whenever we create a page.. is there way to custom "categorize" these modules?

Hello!
is there a way to specify values of the `Styles Tab` directly on the code?

I'm trying to make the Header module (HubSpot's default module) center aligned.
I did this but it doesn't work. It would be nice If I can set initial values for the alignment, sizing, background, etc.

I found this in the doc <https://developers.HubSpot.com/en/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/using-modules-in-templates#setting-template-level-default-values-for-style-fields>

But the explanation is very short.
